Question: In October 1970, this person released New Morning, which some considered a return to form.
Hints: Describing Guthrie's impact on him, this person later wrote: "The songs themselves had the infinite sweep of humanity in them ..
This was the first time this person had sanctioned a re-mix of one of his classic recordings.
Nevertheless, this person's 1965 Newport performance provoked a hostile response from the folk music establishment.
